Serialized Form

  • Package org.kawanfw.commons.api.client

    • Class org.kawanfw.commons.api.client.HttpProtocolParameters extends Object implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      8900046208199627283L

      • Serialized Fields

        • maxLengthForString

          int maxLengthForString
          The maximum size of a string read from input stream. Should be <= 2Mb

        • uploadBufferSize

          int uploadBufferSize
          The buffer size when uploading a file

        • downloadBufferSize

          int downloadBufferSize
          Buffer size for download and copy

        • htmlEncodingOn

          boolean htmlEncodingOn
          Says if we want to html Encode the Clob when using chararacter or ASCII stream Default is true

        • acceptAllSslCertificates

          boolean acceptAllSslCertificates
          Says if we accept all SSL Certificates (example: self signed certificates)

        • encryptionPassword

          char[] encryptionPassword
          The password to use to encrypt all request parameter names and values. null means no encryption is done

        • downloadChunkLength

          long downloadChunkLength
          The chunk length for RemoteInputStream. Defaults to 10Mb.

        • uploadChunkLength

          long uploadChunkLength
          The chunk length for RemoteOutputStream. Defaults to 3Mb.

        • retryCount

          int retryCount
          The number of times a method will be retried

        • httpClientParameters

          Map<K,V> httpClientParameters
          Hash map of HTTP parameters that this collection contains
